page.title: 17A Day in My Life
page.content: "A day in my life" by Katie Spurrell In the morning I get up at 7.45a.m.Igo downstairs and I have my breakfast.I have Albran for my breakfast with the top of the milk.Then I get ready for school.My school is called Thorn Grove.Then I set off for school with my friend.When we get there we play at skipping. When we arrive at school we have a few minutes to play in the playground.Then a teacher comes out and blows the whistle at 8.55am.He or she will tell our class to go in.My class is Junior6 and my teacher is Mr.Clarke.Now we go into Assembly.Our headteacher is Mr. Duckworth.He tells us stories and we
